heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_snapfire
heroes.bio_loc:
世外之地的入口外，被雨水抛弃的纳纳拉克分布着沙漠小径和绿洲。沿途有不少衣衫褴褛的家伙勉强维持着生计，在他们眼中，电炎绝手碧翠丝和她的龙蜥小莫迪非常受欢迎。

碧婆婆因制造武器的无敌技艺闻名遐迩，而且四处播撒着智慧和快乐，还有全世界最可怕的龙炎饼干，她经历过年轻时基恩人的买卖，用迅捷的机智和更为迅捷的枪法活到了高龄。

的确，世外之地散落的尸骨里有拦路的匪徒，还有一群仗着自己的身板觊觎她善意的坏蛋。
heroes.hype_loc: 乐于用她信赖的猎枪轰掉你的腿，也同样乐于用可口又危险的饼干封上你的嘴，电炎绝手碧翠丝非常高兴地与她的龙蜥小莫迪一同驾临战场，时刻准备着用她自制的火炮摧残他们的敌人，或者用小莫迪的密集火痰毁灭他们。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 利用重火力和信赖的蜥蜴摧毁她的敌人

abilities.name: snapfire_scatterblast
abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Damage, Movement Slow, Attack Slow and Slow Duration are increased by %point_blank_dmg_bonus_pct%%% for enemies caught at point-blank range.
abilities.lore_loc: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Scatterblast to deal extra damage as well as stun and knockback enemy units in the point blank range.
facets_loc: Scatterblast is narrower and longer. Bonus damage and slow when enemies are not in point blank range.

abilities.name: snapfire_firesnap_cookie
abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
abilities.lore_loc: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
notes_loc: The cookie projectile has a speed of %projectile_speed%.
abilities.shard_loc: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, healing the target and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does %shard_damage_multiplier_tooltip%%% impact damage to the landing destination.

abilities.name: snapfire_lil_shredder
abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire %buffed_attacks% attacks dealing fixed damage plus a percentage of her attack damage. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
abilities.lore_loc: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
notes_loc: Sets base attack time to %base_attack_time%s for the duration.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.

abilities.name: snapfire_gobble_up
abilities.desc_loc: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to %max_time_in_belly% seconds.
notes_loc: Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.

abilities.name: snapfire_spit_creep
abilities.desc_loc: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit based on the current level of Mortimer Kisses, that slows and applies damage over time. Spit Out has a no minimum launch range.

abilities.name: snapfire_mortimer_kisses
abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over %duration_tooltip% seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of %min_range%. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
abilities.lore_loc: Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.
notes_loc: Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.
Has a minimum travel time of %min_lob_travel_time% and maximum travel time of %max_lob_travel_time%.

abilities.name: snapfire_buckshot
abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire deals %damage_amp%%% more damage with her auto attacks, but has a %miss_chance%%% chance of a glancing shot, dealing %glancing_shot_damage_pct%%% damage.
facets_loc: Whenever Snapfire glances or misses an attack, 2 ricochet attacks will bounce towards nearby enemies.

facets.description_loc: Whenever Snapfire glances or misses an attack, 2 ricochet attacks will bounce towards nearby enemies.
facets.name: snapfire_ricochet_ii

facets.description_loc: Scatterblast is narrower and longer. Bonus damage and slow when enemies are not in point blank range.
facets.name: snapfire_full_bore

new_abilities.name: snapfire_buckshot
new_abilities.desc_loc: Snapfire deals %damage_amp%%% more damage with her auto attacks, but has a %miss_chance%%% chance of a glancing shot, dealing %glancing_shot_damage_pct%%% damage.
facets_loc: Whenever Snapfire glances or misses an attack, 2 ricochet attacks will bounce towards nearby enemies.
